text: Several Canadian naval units have been named HMCS Algonquin. * (I) was a V-class destroyer active from 1944 to 1970. * (II) is an active from 1973 to 2015. Battle Honours *Norway, 1944. *Normandy, 1944. *Arctic, 1944–45. *Arabian Sea ==References== :* Directorate of History and Heritage – HMCS Algonquin Category:Royal Canadian Navy ship names
title: HMCS Algonquin
